div.head: TO HIS LOVING FRIEND AND adopted Sonne Mr. Sa. Rid.
div.p: YOur labour and obseruance herein, with the gift of your first fruits, is both worthy commendations and acceptance: and to cherish you further in this your discouerie, I will giue an addition to your second treatise. So I leaue you to God: and belieue you, not a more louing friend then,
